thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Customer P
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Customer P

author: Customer P
title: Customer P
text: Saw this deal on Reddit r/PS4deals: $10 PSN gift card for $7. I paid via PayPal and received my gift card within an hour or 2. Note that you are required to make an account and a phone number is needed to send a verification code. I have not received any junk mail or junk texts as a result of this purchase.
